channel.title: ShadowScape | All Skills | PK | 718/753 | Custom Teleporters | Working Bosses
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Welcome,
Here at Democracy, Inc. We host many great servers and one of our greatest and newest is our Runescape 718/753 Server.
This server has many great features and these include: - New Items Look, but also Old item Looks by using a command ::changeitemslook. - Vote System, with great rewards. - Godwars Fully Working. - Nex, QBD, KBD all working. - Minigames are 100% working. - All Skill are Trainable. - Custom teleporting system. - Great Player Shops. - Amazing starter items which include a Dragon Scimmy. - Lobby System working. - Multiple worlds, soon to include a PK world. - Loot Share 100% Working - Great Location System to remind you where you are. - Trivia which gives points for correct answers. - Player Own Houses that work 100%. - Dungeoneering that works flawlessly. - Clan System, Clan Citadels and Clan wars all working.
Server Specs: Intel Xeon E5440 @ 2.83GHz (Quad Core) 8.00GB FB-DDR2 2x 128GB SSD's 100MB/s Link Speed 4TB Bandwidth[/size] [URL=http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/3916480770][IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3916480770.png[/img][/URL]
[size=18pt]SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR, COME JOIN TODAY AND BE ONE OF THE FIRST TO BE LEVEL 138
Website: [URL=http://democracy-games.com/ShadowScape/Index.php]http://democracy-games.com/ShadowScape/Index.php[/URL] Client Download: [URL=http://democracy-games.com/ShadowScape/downloads/ShadowScape.jar]http://democracy-games.com/ShadowScape/downloads/ShadowScape.jar[/URL] Democracy, Inc. Portal Page: [URL=http://democracy-games.com]http://democracy-games.com[/URL] [/size]
[size=14pt] Update 05th December 2014: Chat box added to website chat page. Information for TeamSpeak also avaliable on chat page on website.
Update 24th November 2014: Automated Donations added using paypal IPN, check out our amazing donations page here [URL=http://"http://democracy-games.com/ShadowScape/Index.php?page=donate"]http://democracy-games.com/ShadowScape/Index.php?page=donate[/URL]
Update 18th November 2014: Removed monsters spawning millions of the same items, which caused lag and spawn times to be increased. Thanks briney for informing me of this problem
Update 18th November 2014: New minimalist login screen. No useless texts or buttons left to confuse newcomers.
Update 17th November 2014: Login system now works with both uppercase and lowecase names (although in-game you will only see the first letter of your name as uppercase like normal runescape). But it won't keep saying invalid username or password each time.[/size]

item.title: ShadowScape | All Skills | PK | 718/753 | Custom Teleporters | Working Bosses
item.dc:creator: @NickHough NickHough
item.description:
@NickHough wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:10, topic:547894”]Simply start the client and fill in my account details.
Then before i got my pass entered it freezes.

Tried with a short account name but then the client freezes when i enter the server.[/quote]

Hey

The only thing I can suggest is download the new patch and try again. I have removed any unwanted buttons from login to reduce confusion. But do make sure you are just entering a username and password then clicking login. Clicking the “Register Here Now” button doesn’t work and has been removed.

If the problem persists please post here with any details/printscreens or even a soundless video to help us determine what has happened.

Link to post problems too http://democracy-games.com/Forum/viewforum.php?f=10

Many Thanks
NickHough

Read full topic
item.source: ShadowScape | All Skills | PK | 718/753 | Custom Teleporters | Working Bosses

item.title: ShadowScape | All Skills | PK | 718/753 | Custom Teleporters | Working Bosses
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“NickHough, post:5, topic:547894”][quote author=wimstr link=topic=666801.msg4458492#msg4458492 date=1416257364]

Your jar client is bugged as hell.
I can’t even make it to logging-in without the client freezing.

What are you on about? i’ve had a lot of people test it. Have you updated your Java Runtime Environment?

My Java is up to date.
When i run the client i can’t even fill in my acc details it already freezes, although the music keeps running.

Keeps happening even after restarting 12 times.
It’s nothing from my side since other 718 clients work fine.
[/quote]

Are you clicking create account or login?[/quote]

Simply start the client and fill in my account details.
Then before i got my pass entered it freezes.

Tried with a short account name but then the client freezes when i enter the server.

Read full topic
item.source: ShadowScape | All Skills | PK | 718/753 | Custom Teleporters | Working Bosses

item.title: ShadowScape | All Skills | PK | 718/753 | Custom Teleporters | Working Bosses
item.dc:creator: @NickHough NickHough
item.description:
@NickHough wrote:

briney21:

i downloaded this soon as i went to open it a error occured

Hello,

I’m sorry about the error that has occured, is it possible for you to post the details to our Forums please at this link
http://democracy-games.com/Forum/viewforum.php?f=10&sid=3c091af34d4567893689157d6f445073

Thank you

P.S it would be more helpful for any bugs to be posted there then here. I keep a closer eye on our forums then others.

Read full topic
